author: Pmeiring
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces the new CALO-L2 Tau isolation LUT for 2025 post-TS1 pp data-taking. Apart from the pointers to the LUT (`tauIsoLUTFile` and `tauIsoLUTFile2`), the caloParams file is identical to caloParams_2025_v0_2.

The LUT is the "baseline" version from this JIRA ticket, which also contains all validation studies:
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-1395

This PR depends on:
https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TCalorimeter/pull/29


#### PR validation:

The LUT itself has been extensively validated as shown in the above JIRA ticket. This PR (+ PR29 to cms-data) has been tested interactively by merging into the latest CMSSW release (15_0_9_patch3) and reemulating the L1T for a 2025C RAW data file:

```
# Set up latest release
cmsrel CMSSW_15_0_9_patch3
cd CMSSW_15_0_9_patch3/src
cmsenv
git cms-init
git cms-addpkg L1Trigger/Configuration
git cms-addpkg L1Trigger/L1TCalorimeter

# Fetch commit from this PR
git remote add myfork git@github.com:Pmeiring/cmssw.git
git fetch myfork
git cherry-pick 2b24cfb79a1db6a23538d5efbb98bfb478eceaa2

# Fetch commit from PR29 to cms-data
cd L1Trigger/L1TCalorimeter
git clone https://github.com/cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TCalorimeter.git data
cd data
git remote add myfork git@github.com:Pmeiring/L1Trigger-L1TCalorimeter.git
git fetch myfork
git cherry-pick 6d3b5907fd1af249d37b3aeec52c456927f2c969

# Compile and test
cd $CMSSW_BASE/src
scram b -j 8
cmsDriver.py customL1toNANO -s RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,PAT,NANO:@PHYS+@L1DPG --datatier NANOAOD --eventcontent NANOAOD --data --process customl1nano --scenario pp --era Run3 --filein /store/data/Run2025C/Muon0/RAW-RECO/ZMu-PromptReco-v2/000/393/111/00000/00257416-34ad-4c0c-a0d6-937e8625bcab.root --fileout nano.root --python_filename=customl1nano.py --conditions 150X_dataRun3_Prompt_Candidate_2025_06_27_16_39_30 --customise Configuration/DataProcessing/RecoTLR.customisePostEra_Run3 --customise_unsch L1Trigger/Configuration/customiseReEmul.L1TReEmulFromRAW --customise_unsch L1Trigger/Configuration/customiseSettings.L1TSettingsToCaloParams_2025_v0_3 -n 1000 --no_exec
cmsRun customl1nano.py
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: Update CALO-L2 Tau Isolation LUT for 2025 post-TS1
